projectcloud

Class PlayerShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • projectcloud.PlayerShip

  • public class PlayerShip
extends java.lang.Object
    Ship which is managed by player.

    • Method Detail

      • Reset

        public void Reset(int xCoordinate,
                  int yCoordinate)
        Resets the player.
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - Starting x coordinate of ship.
        yCoordinate - Starting y coordinate of ship.

      • isShooting

        public boolean isShooting(long gameTime)
        Checks if player is shooting. It also checks if player can shoot (time between bullets, does a player have any bullet left).
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        true if player is shooting.

      • isFiredBomb

        public boolean isFiredBomb(long gameTime)
        Checks if player is fired a bomb. It also checks if player can fire a bomb (time between bombs, does a player have any bomb left).
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        true if player is fired a bomb.

      • isMoving

        public void isMoving()
        Checks if player moving ship and sets its moving speed if player is moving.

      • Update

        public void Update()
        Updates position of ship, animations.

        public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws ship to the screen.
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics2D
